message: 'Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.'  Maya Angelou
'Love is the key to the solution of the problems of the world.' Martin Luther King Jr
'Love is not a feeling of happiness. Love is a willingness to sacrifice.' Stokely Carmichael
'Self-love has very little to do with how you feel about your outer self. It's about accepting all of yourself.'  Tyra Banks
